name: V.E.X.
description:
Welcome to V.E.X.! We know you trust us with all your science. That’s why we’re glad you’re partnering with us! Come on in and be the first to participate in this exciting experience.

This game was made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50 (50 total development hours). The tutorial should walk you through how to play. But just in case:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Pickup: walk over object
  • Throw: Click and hold (to charge)
  • Aim with mouse

Known issues:

  • If you press ‘space’ to skip the tutorial while a voice audio is playing, the tutorial will end once the audio ends.

Art Credits:

Character animations based on a reskin of https://opengameart.org/content/ikaros-extended

Vortex sprites from https://opengameart.org/content/cosmic-time-magic-effect
